title: Can I publish books on Amazon KDP which are written by my friends? Me and the authors have publishing agreement. - Quora

response.answer_text: Sure, you can. As far as I remember you can even create different “authors” in you account so each of your friends is credited correctly. Or you all come up with a common pen name. But do yourself and your friends a favor and put everything in writing, including how the revenue is distributed and what happens if opportunity knocks and someone want to buy the rights of one of the books. Will save you trouble later.
